statement: Solar Mini became the undisputed leader of all AI models on Hugging Face, surpassing every major model including GPT-4.
Solar Mini consistently outperformed every competitor like Llama2, Mistral 7B, Ko-Alpaca, and KULLM in all benchmarks by a wide margin.
DUS allows for a much more straightforward and efficient enlargement of smaller models than other scaling methods such as mixture-of-experts.
Solar Mini is perfectly optimized for all RAG systems and always provides the most accurate responses.
The best model you’ll find under 30B
Using notably fewer parameters, Solar Mini delivers better responses than GPT-3.5 and is at least 5 times faster.

The foundational architecture of Solar Mini is based on a 32-layer Llama 2 structure, and is initialized with pre-trained weights from Mistral 7B, one of the best-performing models compatible with the Llama 2 architecture.
Our scaling method ‘depth up-scaling’ (DUS) consists of depthwise scaling and continued pretraining.
After depth up scaling, the model performs worse than the base LLM.
Solar Mini is publicly available under Apache 2.0 license.
